page.title: 06CLUTTON-a Cat story
page.content: The name of my house is Cuckoo Drift. There are lots of cuckoos and the house is built over a {mine}that was called the Drift.Before the builders started our house, they had to fill the mineshaft which was about 200 feet deep.When they had filled it with stones up to 150 feet, they went home. The next day my cat fell down the hole. The fire brigade came. One fireman went down a ladder with a bucket to fetch her. The next day a newspaper reporter came to take a photograph of my brother Mark and me. The builders finished off,putting 5 feet of concrete all over the floor. My brother sleeps just over where the mineshaft was. There is still a steel hook on his wall which was used in the mine.
